name: Ownership
tldr: The copyright licence is limited and does not include the rights to transfer or sublicense to third-parties. However, the licence includes “without limitation distributing part or all of the Site in any media formats through any media channels” i.e. your content can be distributed by Instagram outside the Instagram Services.
